import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Dashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}'); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('token'); localStorage.removeItem('user'); navigate('/login'); }; const getDashboardContent = () => { switch (user.role) { case 'student': return (

Student Dashboard

Welcome, {user.name}! You can monitor classes and ratings here.

Monitoring

View class reports and attendance

Rating

Rate lectures and provide feedback

); // In the lecturer case section, update the buttons: case 'lecturer': return (

Lecturer Dashboard

Welcome, {user.name}! Manage your classes and reports.

Classes

Manage your classes

Reports

Submit teaching reports

Monitoring

Monitor student attendance

Rating

View your ratings

{/* Quick Stats */}
Quick Actions
); case 'principal_lecturer': return (

Principal Lecturer Dashboard

Welcome, {user.name}! Oversee courses and provide feedback.

{/* Add PRL specific content */}
); case 'program_leader': return (

Program Leader Dashboard

Welcome, {user.name}! Manage programs and lectures.

{/* Add PL specific content */}
); default: return

Loading...

; } }; return (

LUCT Reporting System

Welcome, {user.name} ({user.role})
{getDashboardContent()}
); }; export default Dashboard;
